thread.section_title: World Wide Stereo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of World Wide Stereo | worldwidestereo.com
thread.title: CAROLE EBERSOLE
thread.title_full: World Wide Stereo reviewed by CAROLE EBERSOLE

author: CAROLE EBERSOLE
title: CAROLE EBERSOLE
text: I had questions about shipping a large TV cross country and their customer service answered all my concerns and I felt confident in placing my order. They even called back to make sure it wasn't a fraudulent order. I received the TV in excellent condition and within the hour I got a call from them asking how everything went. I would highly recommend World Wide Stereo for low prices and top notch customer service.
